# footerHeight

**Instance Property**

The height of the page footer.

## Declaration

```swift
var footerHeight: CGFloat { get set }
```

## Discussion

The footer is measured in points from the bottom of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPrintPageRenderer/printableRect] and is below the content area. The default footer height is 0.0

## Specifying header and footer heights

- **headerHeight**: The height of the page header.
